title: Ranked Changes - Update & Known Issues
body:
Hi Everyone,

As you may have noticed, ranked placements this preseason have been a little funky for some players with higher ranked players sometimes being placed in Iron, among other issues.

Riot SapMagic has made a couple of posts in the Dev Corner recently that shed some light on these issues, what we're monitoring to better understand them, and how we're looking to resolve them. You can check them out below:

Post 1: [Ranked Changes - Week One Update & Known Issues](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/8j7wEnk7-ranked-changes-week-one-update-known-issues)

Post 2: [Ranked Changes - Update & Known Issues #2](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/XqxKvJ4p-ranked-changes-update-known-issues-2)
